statements.sql: select * from `blogs` where (`slug` = 'beyond-transactions-the-social-side-of-adcrypto' and `category_id` = '3' and `data` = 'Beyond Transactions: The Social Side of AdCrypto') limit 1
bindings: Beyond Transactions: The Social Side of AdCrypto

statements.sql: select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'adcrypto' and table_name = 'blogs'

insert into `blogs` (`slug`, `category_id`, `data`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('beyond-transactions-the-social-side-of-adcrypto', '3', '{\"language\":{\"en\":{\"title\":\"Beyond Transactions: The Social Side of AdCrypto\",\"description\":\"

AdCrypto is more than just a transaction platform; it\u2019s a community. This blog explores the social aspects that set AdCrypto apart. From peer-to-peer transactions that foster connectivity to community engagement on social media, discover how AdCrypto brings users together. Dive into the stories of crypto enthusiasts, learn from shared experiences, and understand how AdCrypto is cultivating a vibrant community within the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies.<\/p>\",\"tags\":[\"payment\",\"money\"]},\"es\":{\"title\":\"M\u00e1s all\u00e1 de las transacciones: el lado social de AdCrypto\",\"description\":\"

AdCrypto es m\u00e1s que una simple plataforma de transacciones; es una comunidad. Este blog explora los aspectos sociales que distinguen a AdCrypto. Desde transacciones entre pares que fomentan la conectividad hasta la participaci\u00f3n de la comunidad en las redes sociales, descubra c\u00f3mo AdCrypto une a los usuarios. Sum\u00e9rjase en las historias de entusiastas de las criptomonedas, aprenda de experiencias compartidas y comprenda c\u00f3mo AdCrypto est\u00e1 cultivando una comunidad vibrante dentro del din\u00e1mico mundo de las criptomonedas.<\/p>\",\"tags\":[\"paso\",\"diero\"]},\"ar\":{\"title\":\"\u0645\u0627 \u0648\u0631\u0627\u0621 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0639\u0627\u0645\u0644\u0627\u062a: \u0627\u0644\u062c\u0627\u0646\u0628 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u062c\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0639\u064a \u0644\u0640 AdCrypto\",\"description\":\"

AdCrypto \u0647\u0648 \u0623\u0643\u062b\u0631 \u0645\u0646 \u0645\u062c\u0631\u062f \u0645\u0646\u0635\u0629 \u0644\u0644\u0645\u0639\u0627\u0645\u0644\u0627\u062a\u061b \u0625\u0646\u0647 \u0645\u062c\u062a\u0645\u0639. \u062a\u0633\u062a\u0643\u0634\u0641 \u0647\u0630\u0647 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062f\u0648\u0646\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062c\u0648\u0627\u0646\u0628 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u062c\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0639\u064a\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u064a \u062a\u0645\u064a\u0632 AdCrypto. \u0628\u062f\u0621\u064b\u0627 \u0645\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0639\u0627\u0645\u0644\u0627\u062a \u0645\u0646 \u0646\u0638\u064a\u0631 \u0625\u0644\u0649 \u0646\u0638\u064a\u0631 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u064a \u062a\u0639\u0632\u0632 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u062a\u0635\u0627\u0644 \u0648\u0627\u0644\u0645\u0634\u0627\u0631\u0643\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062c\u062a\u0645\u0639\u064a\u0629 \u0639\u0644\u0649 \u0648\u0633\u0627\u0626\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0648\u0627\u0635\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u062c\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0639\u064a\u060c \u0627\u0643\u062a\u0634\u0641 \u0643\u064a\u0641 \u064a\u062c\u0645\u0639 AdCrypto \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0633\u062a\u062e\u062f\u0645\u064a\u0646 \u0645\u0639\u064b\u0627. \u0627\u0646\u063a\u0645\u0633 \u0641\u064a \u0642\u0635\u0635 \u0639\u0634\u0627\u0642 \u0627\u0644\u0639\u0645\u0644\u0627\u062a \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0634\u0641\u0631\u0629\u060c \u0648\u062a\u0639\u0644\u0645 \u0645\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u062c\u0627\u0631\u0628 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0634\u062a\u0631\u0643\u0629\u060c \u0648\u0627\u0641\u0647\u0645 \u0643\u064a\u0641 \u062a\u0639\u0645\u0644 AdCrypto \u0639\u0644\u0649 \u062a\u0646\u0645\u064a\u0629 \u0645\u062c\u062a\u0645\u0639 \u0646\u0627\u0628\u0636 \u0628\u0627\u0644\u062d\u064a\u0627\u0629 \u062f\u0627\u062e\u0644 \u0639\u0627\u0644\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0639\u0645\u0644\u0627\u062a \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0634\u0641\u0631\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062f\u064a\u0646\u0627\u0645\u064a\u0643\u064a.<\/p>\",\"tags\":[\"\u0642\u0633\u0637\",\"\u0645\u0627\u0644\"]}},\"image\":\"d8b63ff4-6c31-4204-b64f-a667b97cbd96.webp\"}', '2024-01-29 request.request_request:
array:12 [
  "fileholder-image" => "d8b63ff4-6c31-4204-b64f-a667b97cbd96.jpg"
  "_token" => "H0XMxOZHrTOFf2FFNePi5TY204GbNTmTnbl5GR8Q"
  "en_title" => "Beyond Transactions: The Social Side of AdCrypto"
  "en_description" => "<p>AdCrypto is more than just a transaction platform; it’s a community. This blog explores the social aspects that set AdCrypto apart. From peer-to-peer transactions that foster connectivity to community engagement on social media, discover how AdCrypto brings users together. Dive into the stories of crypto enthusiasts, learn from shared experiences, and understand how AdCrypto is cultivating a vibrant community within the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies.</p>"
  "en_tags" => array:2 [
    0 => "payment"
    1 => "money"
  ]
  "es_title" => "Más allá de las transacciones: el lado social de AdCrypto"
  "es_description" => "<p>AdCrypto es más que una simple plataforma de transacciones; es una comunidad. Este blog explora los aspectos sociales que distinguen a AdCrypto. Desde transacciones entre pares que fomentan la conectividad hasta la participación de la comunidad en las redes sociales, descubra cómo AdCrypto une a los usuarios. Sumérjase en las historias de entusiastas de las criptomonedas, aprenda de experiencias compartidas y comprenda cómo AdCrypto está cultivando una comunidad vibrante dentro del dinámico mundo de las criptomonedas.</p>"
  "es_tags" => array:2 [
    0 => "paso"
    1 => "diero"
  ]
  "ar_title" => "ما وراء المعاملات: الجانب الاجتماعي لـ AdCrypto"
  "ar_description" => "<p>AdCrypto هو أكثر من مجرد منصة للمعاملات؛ إنه مجتمع. تستكشف هذه المدونة الجوانب الاجتماعية التي تميز AdCrypto. بدءًا من المعاملات من نظير إلى نظير التي تعزز الاتصال والمشاركة المجتمعية على وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي، اكتشف كيف يجمع AdCrypto المستخدمين معًا. انغمس في قصص عشاق العملات المشفرة، وتعلم من التجارب المشتركة، وافهم كيف تعمل AdCrypto على تنمية مجتمع نابض بالحياة داخل عالم العملات المشفرة الديناميكي.</p>"
  "ar_tags" => array:2 [
    0 => "قسط"
    1 => "مال"
  ]
  "category" => "3"
]
